import axios from'axios';// Using the OpenWeatherMap API - you'll need to get your own API key
const API_KEY='02bbdf7cb95dd683f0a72393e650f75e';const BASE_URL='https://api.openweathermap.org/data/2.5';export const fetchWeatherData=async location=>{try{const response=await axios.get(`${BASE_URL}/weather`,{params:{q:location,appid:API_KEY,units:'metric'}});return{temperature:response.data.main.temp,condition:response.data.weather[0].main,description:response.data.weather[0].description,icon:response.data.weather[0].icon,location:response.data.name};}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching weather data:',error);throw error;}};
